title: A prototype pond water management system (dissolved oxygen, pH and temperature) for giant freshwater prawn farming in Pak Phanang, Southern Thailand
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Panyapong Songpayome, Supapron Sutin, Warawut Sukmak, Uraiwun Wanthong, Nunticha Limchoowong, Phitchan Sricharoen, Panjit Musik
